select id,rname,picture,houseIntroduce,price from house
where houseType like concat('%',#{condition},'%') union SELECT id,rname,picture,houseIntroduce,price from house where area like concat(#{condition},'%') union SELECT id,rname,picture,houseIntroduce,price from house where district like concat(#{condition},'%') union SELECT id,rname,picture,houseIntroduce,price from house where house_area_code=(select area_code from sys_position where area_name like concat(#{condition},'%'))
